At 10:54 18/01/2005, you wrote:


>To solve this and to let to neural networks to be a "Turing machine",
>Schmidhuber have introduced the LSTM cells. (see
>http://www.idsia.ch/~juergen/rnn.html) .

Hi, I'm reading this now (after a quick search because the original page is 
gone) and have got a bit puzzled quite near the start.

They say that they used a recurrent neural network and gradient descents to 
train it.  But I thought that gradient descents could only generally be 
applied to a non-recurrent network...?

         Anybody?

         Ian
